title: Peter Schiff Dives into Bitcoin NFTs with ‘Golden Triumph’ Art Project
description: Peter Schiff, a well-known critic of Bitcoin and a staunch supporter of gold, has taken an unexpected turn into the world of Bitcoin-based non-fungible tokens (NFTs). Schiff announced his involvement in an art project named “Golden Triumph” on May 26, 2023, via a tweet. The project involves a series of prints, each corresponding to a […]

title: Bitcoin Price  Analysis: Bearish Curve Dominates as BTC Drops to $26,696
description: Bitcoin price analysis reveals that the bears are dominating the market today. BTC, the leading cryptocurrency, has experienced a significant decline in recent times, triggering concerns among investors and industry observers.  Currently, the BTC is present at $26,696 and is down by nearly 0.39% in the last 24 hours. The $26,833 level proved to be ... Read more

title: Ripple’s XRP Poised to Revolutionize the $16 Trillion Market, Aiming to Become Global Standard for Payments
description:
Ripple’s latest report highlights that finance leaders view payments as a critical gateway to crypto adoption and are interested in leveraging tokenization for innovation in various industries. The report also emphasizes the growing interest in decentralized finance (DeFi) among financial institutions, with 76% of finance leaders expressing interest in institutional DeFi for driving innovation in [...]

Der Beitrag Ripple’s XRP Poised to Revolutionize the $16 Trillion Market, Aiming to Become Global Standard for Payments erschien zuerst auf Crypto News Flash.
